downloadTitle: Building High Performance Storage for Hyper-V Cluster on Scale-Out File Servers using Violin Windows Flash Arrays
downloadDescription: This white paper demonstrates the capabilities and performance for Violin Windows Flash Array (WFA), a next generation All-Flash Array storage platform.

downloadFile.name: Building High Performance Storage for Hyper-V Cluster on Scale-Out File Servers using Violin Windows Flash Arrays.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/5/0/4/504b3442-25ac-4afb-bc94-fa814b95ac16/Building High Performance Storage for Hyper-V Cluster on Scale-Out File Servers using Violin Windows Flash Arrays.pdf

detailsSection: This white paper demonstrates the capabilities and performance for Violin Windows Flash Array (WFA), a next generation All-Flash Array storage platform. With the joint efforts of Microsoft and Violin Memory, WFA provides built-in high performance, availability and scalability by the tight integration of Violin’s All Flash Array and Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2 Scale-Out File Server Cluster.
detailsSection_file_name: Building High Performance Storage for Hyper-V Cluster on Scale-Out File Servers using Violin Windows Flash Arrays.pdf
